com.github.tilastokeskus.minotaurus.scenario

Class AbstractScenario

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.tilastokeskus.minotaurus.scenario.AbstractScenario
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Plugin, Scenario, Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TestScenario

    public abstract class AbstractScenario
extends Object
implements Scenario
    A skeletal implementation of a Scenario to help creating scenarios as easily as possible.

        public void setMaze(Maze maze)
